name: techpoint
description: > [!TIP] > TechPoint is a name that suggests your website is the central hub or "focal point" for purchasing advanced technology products. The name implies that your site is a go-to destination for customers looking for the latest and most cutting-edge devices. It conveys a sense of modernity and specialization in tech products like smartphones, laptops, living technologies, and more.

scripts.app: concurrently npm "npm run server" "npm run client"

author: BekCodingAddict
